title: X-Acto® TeacherPro® Classroom Electric Pencil Sharpener, Blue
description: The break resistant X-ACTO Teacher Pro Pencil Sharpener lets students spend less time sharpening and more time focusing on what matters. This electric pencil sharpener gets woodcase pencils to a precise tip, so there’s less lead breakage and less distractions in the classroom. The SmartStop feature prevents oversharpening by automatically shutting off the electric motor when a pencil reaches ideal sharpness, while a bold LED light lets students know when sharpening is complete. The auto-adjust dial works with all pencil sizes and makes sharpening less distracting while the slip-resistant bottom keeps the pencil sharpener steady. Finally, the SafeStart electric motor stops when the extra-large, easy-to-empty shavings bin is removed. It’s also compatible with colored pencils. Stay sharp with X-ACTO, the #1 electric pencil sharpener brand!
